title: Could you adopt an older child? (Calderdale Metropolitan Borough Council)
text: ( Source : Calderdale Metropolitan Borough Council ) During National Adoption Week (Monday 19 - Sunday 25 October 2015 ) Calderdale Council is asking people to come forward to adopt children over four years old. The theme of this year's
